price: Those who disbelieve are protectors of one another[46]. Unless you do likewise, there will be persecution in the land and great corruption.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٍۚ إِلَّا تَفۡعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتۡنَةٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَفَسَادٞ كَبِيرٞ
footnotes: [46] i.e., taking one another as allies and abandoning all bonds with the disbelievers.
